title: Splatoon
short_plot_summary: Inkling characters called Inklings battle with paint guns in colorful turf wars in order to claim territory and achieve victory.
explanation: A squid, representing the main characters called Inklings who are humanoids with the ability to transform into squids
A palette, symbolizing the central theme of ink and colorful paint in the game
A water gun, illustrating the paint guns the Inklings use to cover territory with their team's color
A sneaker, signifying the character customization options in the game, including outfits and accessories
A checkered flag, representing the goal of winning turf wars and achieving victory in matches
